item.description:
Hi all,

I am putting together an event at Tempo in Waltham this Saturday night at 8. You must RSVP so that I know how many to expect. It will be a fun gathering so people can mingle and get to know each other. The event is for couples and singles who are looking to make new friends. Hope to see you all there. Feel free to email me at my personal email if you have questions: kristie.goodgion@genzyme.com

See you there!!!
item.name: Drinks and Food
